concept.title: Appendix: Provisioning Charging and Common entities using SM GUI

conbody.p: This chapter allows you to provision the following entities under the Charging & Policy category in the Service Manager Graphical User Interface (SM GUI):

ul.li: Charging entities, which are applicable only to NCC
Common entities, such as counters and thresholds, which are applicable to both charging and policy

conbody.p: For more information on SM, see the Service Manager chapter in NOKIA Converged Charging VNF Overview.
